title: Education for Sustainable Development through STEM-PBL-Based Renewable Energy Engineering Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Science Principles (Energy Conversion, Systems Thinking) and Digital Tool Application Skills
context.additional_context: Learners possess intermediate knowledge in EDP (Engineering Design Process) and renewable energy, with a project-based collaborative environment accessible via LMS.

learning_goals: Learners can solve sustainability issues by applying systems thinking when designing renewable energy systems.
Learners can analyze real-world environmental problems and create engineering design prototypes (digital/physical) via the STEM-PBL approach.
Learners can share design processes and incorporate feedback with team members using collaborative tools (online forums, LMS workspaces).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
